soDirEntry Struct Reference

Definition of the directory entry data type. More...

#include <sofs_direntry.h>

Data Fields

unsigned char name [MAX_NAME+1]
 the name of a file (whether a regular file, a directory or a symbolic link): it must be a NUL-terminated string
uint32_t nInode
 the associated inode number

Detailed Description

Definition of the directory entry data type.

It is divided in:

  • name of the file - as it is generically referred to
  • number of the inode - where the file attributes are stored.
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
